description: This is a test suite for the assessments router API built with FastAPI. It includes tests for listing assessments with pagination, creating assessments, and retrieving a non-existent assessment to verify proper error handling.

classes.name: _FakeAssessmentsService
classes.description: A mock service class simulating assessment-related methods for testing purposes.

methods.name: test_assessments_list_ok_with_pagination
methods.description: Tests fetching a list of assessments with pagination parameters.

methods.name: test_assessments_create_returns_201
methods.description: Tests creating a new assessment and verifies the response data.

methods.name: test_assessments_get_not_found
methods.description: Tests the retrieval of a non-existent assessment to ensure 404 error handling.
